title: services
content: # `prefect.concurrency.v1.services` ## Classes ### `ConcurrencySlotAcquisitionServiceError` Raised when an error occurs while acquiring concurrency slots. ### `ConcurrencySlotAcquisitionService` **Methods:** #### `acquire` ```python theme={null} acquire(self, task_run_id: UUID, timeout_seconds: Optional[float] = None) -> httpx.Response ```
